name: The Boar Princess
description:
Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round: Gain 1 Omni Element. (Max 2)
(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their Weapon or Artifact replaced.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round:</color> Gain 1 $[K411]. (Max 2)\n(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon or {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact replaced.)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Each time you discard an Equipment Card from one of your characters during this Round:</color> Gain 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color>. (Max 2)\n(This effect can be triggered by the loss of an Equipment Card from a character falling or from having their {SPRITE_PRESET#3003}Weapon or {SPRITE_PRESET#3004}Artifact replaced.)
storytext: In ancient legends, the Boar Kingdom was prosperous and filled with joy. The young princess of the Kingdom took the wise Fox and long-lived Tortoise, and set out on the road to the north, hoping to turn the little wolf back into that good child...
